topic.title: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade (Beta): Installation Overview

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade (Beta): Installation Overivew

body.p: This document describes the installation process for HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade in a baremetal environment.

section.title: About the installation
section.p: The HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade installation installs HP Helion Lifecycle Management, creates a base HP Helion Openstack cloud, and configures network virtualization through HP Distributed Cloud Networking. Using a separate installation, you integrate Wind River Linux servers into the HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade environment.
After installation, you can interact with the HP Helion Openstack cloud using the Horizon graphical interface or using the CLIs of the respective services.
